com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors

Class RapidFireWeapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors.Unit
      • com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors.Weapon
        • com.aston.group.stationdefender.actors.RapidFireWeapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actor

    public class RapidFireWeapon
extends Weapon
    RapidFireWeapon is a class that represents a RapidFireWeapon object that Humans (Unit) can arm themselves with and use to destroy Aliens.

    This Weapon can overload and rapidly fire.

    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act(float delta)
        Similar to usual act method, but if the Weapon hits on all shots the Weapon "overloads" and cannot fire for the next call of act. No damage is dealt on this round,
        Specified by:
        act in interface Actor
        Overrides:
        act in class Weapon
        Parameters:
        delta - - The time in seconds since the last render.

      • getOverloaded

        public boolean getOverloaded()
        Returns if the Weapon is overloaded.
        Returns:
        Overloaded state of the Weapon.

      • setOverloaded

        public void setOverloaded(boolean overloaded)
        Sets if the Weapon is overloaded or not.
        Parameters:
        overloaded - state of the Weapon.
